parameters.name: OperationId
parameters.description:
The ID of the operation.

You can call the [ListStackGroupOperations](~~151342~~) operation to query the operation ID.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return.

*   Pages start from page 1.
*   Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

*   Valid values: 1 to 50.
*   Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the stack group.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~131035~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
